name: starcounter-include
description: Custom Element to include HTML partials/templates from Starcounter

scripts.serve: concurrently -n "mocked SC,polyserve" "npm run mockserver" "npm run polyserve" --kill-others -s first
scripts.test: concurrently -n "mocked SC,WCT" "npm run mockserver" "npm run wct" --kill-others -s first
scripts.test:no-sauce: concurrently -n "mocked SC,WCT" "npm run mockserver" "npm run wct:no-sauce" --kill-others -s first
scripts.test:sauce-only: concurrently -n "mocked SC,WCT" "npm run mockserver" "npm run wct:sauce-only" --kill-others -s first
